artist: Painter: After Annibale Carracci; Draftsman: Duchemin; Etcher: Louis Yves Quéverdo; Engraver: Claude Niquet
description: St. Stephen kneels at foot of walls being stoned; God and Christ at Upper Right surrounded by angels; above Stephen angel descends with crown
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in black: [No. 673    AN. CARRACHE  Eco le Itali.ne/ dess.t par Duchemin   Gravé a l\'Eau-forte par Quéverdo   Termé par Niquet/ LE MARTYRE DE ST. ETIENNE]; in pencil on sheet: [1-230]
title: Le Martyre de St. Etienne
